form.name: diarrhoea_with_no_dehydration_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC Diarrhoea> Diarrhoea with no dehydration Two

field.name: Give Extra Fluids (as much as the child will take)
f child is still breastfeeding, breastfeed frequently and for longer at each feed
If child is exclusively breastfed, give ORS or clean water in addition to breast milk
If child is NOT exclusively breastfed, give one or more of the following:
Safe food-based fluids: such as light soup without pepper, strained rice water, mashed kenkey with clean water, coconut water, koko (porridge)
It is especially important to give ORS at home when:
The child has been treated with some or severe dehydration during this visit
The child cannot return to a health facility if the diarrhoea gets worse
